string.text: {=RTSCameraCommandSystem_click_to_select_formation_hint}You can directly select formation by pressing {KeyName} on them. Selected formation will be highlighted with outline.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_highlight_selected_formation_hint}Selected formation will be highlighted with outline.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_attack_specific_formation_hint}You can give focus attack order by pressing {KeyName} on enemy formation.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_attack_specific_formation_alt_hint}(New Feature) Press alt at the same time to keep previous movement order.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_after_enemy_formation_eliminated_hint}Behavior when the attacked enemy formation is eliminated.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_highlight_target_formation_hint}Target formation will be highlighted with outline.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_highlightonrtsviewonlyhint}Only enable highlight on rts view. In normal mode formation will not be highlighted.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_movementtargetmorevisibleonrtsviewonly}More visible Movement Target on rts view only
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_targetmorevisibleonrtsviewonlyhint}Make Movement Target more visible on rts view only. Keep the original appearance on normal mode.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_select_formation_hint}Select your formation or order your selected formations to attack an enemy formation.
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_tactic_level_required}You tactic level should be at least {level}
{=RTSCameraCommandSystem_target_only_usage}For example, let your archers focus shooting while holding position.
